creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Sleeveless coat of deep blue satin with embroidered design in satin stitch. Three five-clawed dragons in yellow; loose clouds, bats, floral sprays, phoenix, and Buddhist emblem in shades of blue, green, rust, red, yellow, and pink. Conventional type border; a shaped collar-band simulated with rows of couched gold thread. Coat slit at sides, with loose tabs, open down front, and lined with thin pink silk. Fringed bottom.
title: VEST
